page.title: 15BUCKNALL SHOP
page.content:
{Bucknall shop}is situated on the school corner only a hundred metres from the school. It is owned by Mrs Wilkinson. It has two large windows which are painted white and green.
Inside it is painted white and green. The opening times are 8_30 until 5_30. Because of her one hour break for lunch the shop is open 8 hours.
Her best selling item is bread she has bread delivered more than once a week.
The most expensive item is Calor gas.
Mrs Stamp had the shop before Mrs Wilkinson and before that Miss Wilkinson had the shop.
